pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: win 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 4 core 3 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Discrete Nvidia GeForce GTX 750+ series and similar (2 GB)
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
